name: anything-llm
description: The best solution for turning private documents into a chat bot using off-the-shelf tools and commercially viable AI technologies.
author: Timothy Carambat (Mintplex Labs)

scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint && cd ../collector && npm run lint
scripts.setup: cd server && npm install && cd ../collector && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && npm run setup:envs && npm run prisma:setup && echo "Please run npm run dev:server, npm run dev:collector, and npm run dev:frontend in separate terminal tabs."
scripts.setup:envs:
cp -n ./frontend/.env.example ./frontend/.env && cp -n ./server/.env.example ./server/.env.development && cp -n ./collector/.env.example ./collector/.env && echo "All ENV files copied!
"
scripts.dev:all: npx concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:collector"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:setup: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.normalize:translations: cd frontend/src/locales && node normalizeEn.mjs && cd ../../.. && npm run lint && npm run verify:translations
